channel.title: Copycat and Changeling [BD and Unseen Support]
channel.description:
Copycat BD Support
Duplicate (Day): Choose a player, you will become their class tonight if they are BD, this lasts until the end of the night, if they were converted you will become their original class and if they started as non-BD you will get a random BD class - Infinite Uses, cannot be used on the same person twice, cannot be used on the King
Changeling Unseen Support
Mimic (Day): Choose a non-unseen player, become the Unseen version of their class tonight if they can be converted, if they can't the ability will fail, effect wears off at the end of the night - Same restrictions as Duplicate
Notes: Might work better as a Neutral idk

item.title: Copycat and Changeling [BD and Unseen Support]
item.dc:creator: Jazz
item.description:
I specialise in making classes that would make Boslof hate me

Read full topic
